category.name: General
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: PREF_ITEMSAVEAS_USING_IDGENERATION
preference.preference_description: This site level preference will be used to enable or disable Intelligent Part Numbering functionality for Saveas. false: If the preference is OFF then the properties will not be shown to the Item SaveAs dialog. If the preference is off the Saveas behaves as a normal Saveas. This is the default value. true: If the preference is ON then the properties will be shown to the Item SaveAs dialog
